title: JOSE GONZALEZ RINCON
text:
JOSE GONZALEZ RINCON
    Civil Engineer & MBA Candidate

¬© 2025 Jose Gonzalez Rincon ¬∑ Vancouver, BC ¬∑

```

Project management
    
      I offer comprehensive project management services, ensuring control of scope, schedule, budget, and quality from the pre-construction stage through final delivery to clients or investors. I assist in strategic decision-making, optimizing resources, mitigating risks, and guaranteeing adherence to deadlines and technical standards. My approach combines rigorous planning, effective coordination, and continuous monitoring to achieve efficient, profitable, and well-executed projects.
    
  

  
  
    
    Construction Management
    
      I manage the entire construction process, coordinating teams, suppliers, and subcontractors to ensure orderly, safe, and compliant execution, adhering to the plans and specifications. Together with a professional team, we monitor progress, control costs, verify quality, and guarantee regulatory compliance throughout the entire construction process. My goal is to bring each project to fruition with efficiency, operational clarity, and high technical standards.
    
  

  
  
    
    Digital Management
    
      I apply BIM methodology to improve the planning, coordination, and control of construction projects, integrating technical information into a collaborative digital environment. Through 3D modeling, interdisciplinary coordination, and clash detection, we optimize workflow and minimize errors during execution. I manage project models, plans, and data in an organized manner, facilitating more precise and efficient decision-making aligned with time, cost, and quality objectives.
    
  



  ¬© 2025 Jose Gonzalez Rincon ¬∑ Vancouver, BC ¬∑

title: Jose Gonzalez Rincon
text:
Professional Experience
Co-founder and Project Manager, NASSE Construcciones SAS, Bogot√°
I co-founded and led a construction company, managing more than 16 completed projects and budgets over CAD $2m. I supervised financial planning, cost control, and process optimization, achieving a 50% improvement in client satisfaction through strategic management and effective teamwork.
Project Manager | Project Director | Technical Director, CoD-Sign Architecture SAS, Bogot√°
As Project and Technical Director at CoD-Sign Architecture SAS, I managed more than 15 projects totaling CAD $19.8M. I supervised the viability, budgeting, and cost control while leading a team of 13 professionals. I led the implementing SINCO‚Äôs ADPRO module, I improved internal efficiency by 90% and strengthened national project delivery standards.
Cost Control Professional, ARPRO Arquitectos e Ingenieros SA, Bogot√°
As a Cost Control Professional at ARPRO Arquitectos e Ingenieros SA, I managed direct and indirect costs for more than 10 projects valued at over CAD $100M. I conducted site inspections, optimized budget control through SINCO‚Äôs ADPRO system, and provided financial insights that supported new project acquisitions and bidding success.
